Description:
Here is the Caribbean Sea and the rugged XVII century. The mighty kingdom of Spain, England, France and the Netherlands are fighting over the ownership of the rich colonies. Will you be able to grab a piece of production and become the richest and most powerful man in the New World? 
In the third part of the popular game, you will once again challenge the stormy ocean, fierce corsairs and warships of the leading powers. Click your way as a trader or adventurer, run by various courts in the spectacular naval battles, route the new trade routes and arrange desperate attacks. Piracy on their own or together with your friends in multiplayer mode.
